actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend section 21 of the Second Liberty Bond Act to provide for the retirement of the public debt.

summary.text: Requires in each budget submitted to the Congress by the President an item requesting an appropriation equal to 1 percent of the aggregate face amount of the obligations (not including those held by the Secretary of the Treasury) outstanding on July 1 of the year of enactment of this Act, which item shall be used exclusively for the retirement of such public debt. (Amends 31 U.S.C. 757b)

titles.title: A bill to amend section 21 of the Second Liberty Bond Act to provide for the retirement of the public debt.
